subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jay DeMerit is likely to get a look from U.S. soccer Coach Bob Bradley, but he faces stiff competition for a place in the middle of a defense that includes Oguchi Onyewu and Jimmy Conrad.
snippet: Jay DeMerit is likely to get a look from U.S. soccer Coach Bob Bradley, but he faces stiff competition for a place in the middle of a defense that includes Oguchi Onyewu and Jimmy Conrad.
